definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: Once again park well away from the area.
sentences.chinese: 再說一遍，把車停得遠遠的。

sentences.english: But the development of tolerancing design in mechanical product has lagged behind them greatly.
sentences.chinese: 但是，機械產品公差設計的發展卻遠遠地滯後於它們。

sentences.english: The other kind of whale is much larger than the killer whale .
sentences.chinese: 其他種類的鯨魚要遠遠大於逆戟鯨。

sentences.english: And it's not enough to just depend on books in the proccess of learning.
sentences.chinese: 對於其學習過程僅僅依靠書本及培訓是遠遠不夠的。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他們的角色遠遠不侷限於亂七八糟的玩耍，專家說。

sentences.english: And in God's house forevermore, my dwelling place shall be.
sentences.chinese: 我必居住在主殿中，直到永永遠遠。

sentences.english: The music of the far-away summer flutters around the Autumn seeking its former nest.
sentences.chinese: 遠遠往了的夏之音樂，翱翔於秋間，尋求它的舊壘。

sentences.english: The protoss' ability to manipulate time and space far surpasses the limited understanding of other races.
sentences.chinese: 神族操縱時間和空間的能力已經遠遠超越了其他種族。

sentences.english: The acting skill of the player is not a quarter as good as his professional brothers.
sentences.chinese: 那位演員的演技遠遠不如他的師兄弟們。

sentences.english: A Persian cat is all very well, I said; but a Persian cat is not enough.
sentences.chinese: 我是說，一隻波斯貓的確很好，但卻遠遠不夠。

sentences.english: His God was greater than Baal or Ashtoreth.
sentences.chinese: 他的神遠遠大過巴力和亞他斯錄。

sentences.english: Now microbes are appearing far outside their environmental niches.
sentences.chinese: 現在微生物遠遠超出了它們的棲身環境。

sentences.english: See the Buddhist holy places, and far to see iron temple, incense quite sheng. Run!
sentences.chinese: 看到佛家聖地了，遠遠看見鐵林寺，香火蠻盛的。

sentences.english: Year in and year out, coir raincoat and bamboo hat keep searching by raising their heads and looking far ahead.
sentences.chinese: 江南的蓑衣和竹笠經年地尋找，在遠遠的翹首遠望。

sentences.english: But his anti-corruption law and an ethics task-force did not go far enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的反腐敗法和道德工作推動力遠遠還不夠。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
(in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
it can clearly be seen (that this is the case)/it is (thus) clear/clear/visible
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
